topics.body:
Here's a random question: what do you guys think will be the next big thing in different forms of mass media?

What I mean by this is for example League of Legends is the new big thing in video gaming, if you're wondering how popular the game is they're having to create their own network cause so many people play it that their current server network can't handle it and daily 27 million people play it.

Pacific Rim & the Godzilla reboot might be the king of kaiju and mecha depending on how the sequels go cause transformers pisses everyone off now thanks to *EXPLOSIONS* (trademarked by michael bay).

I mean what franchises do you think will be the next big thing?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
Ever think those retro-era adjectives are just words that already have a meaning but then a couple of folks decided to use it to describe something else entirely?

For example:
Groovy
Gnarly
Radical
Tubular
Funky

Anyone else getting this observation?
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
I just discovered that, no big surprise, I'm terrible at Let's Play.

One, I don't talk much since I indulge myself a lot when playing.
Two, I'm terrible at scripts.
Three, I'm terrible at jokes withing scripts.
Four, I'm a casual (as in, not that serious gamer)
Five, i have a too serious demeanor.
And six, I don't have a signature laugh.

Instead, I'm just gonna do a walkthrough.
